section.heading: Origination of registration in beneficiary form.
section.text: A security, whether evidenced by certificate or account, is registered in beneficiary form when the registration includes a designation of a beneficiary to take the ownership at the death of the owner or the deaths of all multiple owners.

annotations.annotation: Uniform Law: This section is based upon § 304 of the Uniform Nonprobate Transfers on Death Act (1991 Act).
